content: Kun Steel is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kun_Steel.md', within the main section titled 'Kun Steel'.
The content is as follows:
Kun Steel is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
